title: Free Trials
desc: There are free trials available for every course, so you can check out the content and teaching style before registering.

title: Doubt Support
desc: Teaching Assistance is a very friendly and helpful service, so you can ask all your doubts by simply raising them.

title: Refund Policy
desc: It's simple to cancel Coding Ninjas course. The authorities will refund you a full amount within 7 days.

title: Placements
desc: Once a student has completed a Coding Ninjas course, they can apply for jobs and internships.

title: Course Pause
desc: The flexibility of the platform allows you to leave your learning for a limited period and return at a later date despite external activities.

title: Certificate
desc: A certificate of completion is provided after the 80% and a certificate of excellence is provided after the 90% course at Coding Ninjas.

title: Excellent Instructors
desc: From the most basic level to the most advanced, each course is designed accordingly.

title: Course Curriculum
desc: The courses are designed in a range of levels, starting from the simplest to the most advanced.

title: EMI Payment
desc: If you are unable to pay the full amount at the beginning of a course, you will be able to use the EMI payment option on the payment page.

title: Lots Of Practice
desc: Every lecture is followed by a practical problem of any level with a video hint so students will be able to understand both the theoretical and practical aspects.

title: Practice Tests
desc: The level of your knowledge is checked through practice tests after each topic.
